entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Are !UseThreadAllocationContexts branches relevant? #115102
  • [RuntimeAsync] Dynamic methods (System.Reflection.Emit). #115101
  • [RuntimeAsync] Reflection/introspection support #115099
  • [RuntimeAsync] R2R support #115098
  • [RuntimeAsync] Multicore JIT support. #115097
  • [RuntimeAsync] PGO support. #115096
  • [RuntimeAsync] EnC support #115095
  • [RuntimeAsync] Revisit TODOs in places of questionable intersections of existing scenarios and Async #115094
  • [RuntimeAsync] Implement ilasm/ildasm support for the MethodImpl.Async #115093
  • [API Proposal]: Simplifying Dependency Injection with `Injectable` Attributes and `AddInjectables` Extension Method #115092
  • Unnecessary conditional check #115091
  • Regression: Extra range check generated #115090
  • HttpListener always fails with error 32 on ports 50000-50059 #115088
  • Test failure: System.Globalization.Tests.IdnMappingIdnaConformanceTests.GetAscii_Success #115087

Closed

  • [linux] Segfault while invoking Roslyn's csc.dll with long command line #98936
    10.0.0
  • Intrinsics are not documented #42374
  • [Analyzer] Unawaited / returned tasks created with a disposable in using block for that disposable #78394
    Future
  • JIT: cycles in connection graph lead to non-minimal fix point retypings #115017
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • ML-KEM: PKCS12/PFX Loading #115100
    area-System.Security, 10.0.0
  • win-x86: Replace "ret n" thunks with assembly code #115089
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Test /etc/os-release existence before grepping #115086
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 135.0.7049.114, windows: 136.0.7103.48 #115084
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [RISC-V] Extend register for slti #114900
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: revise may/must point to stack analysis #115080
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • [RuntimeAsync] Merge from labs, all except JIT #114675
    area-VM-coreclr, runtime-coreclr, runtime-async
  • [wasm] Use packedsimd in hexconverter #115062
  • JIT: Model partial defs less conservatively in liveness when possible #115081
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2696859 #115007
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Simplify 64-bit platform conditions #115083
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ML-KEM: Fix-up ASN.1 reading and writing logic #115066
    area-System.Security, 10.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] [STJ] Account for F# CompilationMappingAttribute now supporting multiple declarations. #115077
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] [STJ] Account for F# CompilationMappingAttribute now supporting multiple declarations. #115076
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.x
  • Create a single copy of stub templates #114462
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Special-case `vinserti*` when considering embedded mask optimization #115074
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable CoreCLR/tvOS build #111804
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-tvos, community-contribution
  • [clr-interp] Implement `CEE_LOCALLOC` and frame data allocator for dynamic stack allocations #114860
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [Android] Support static linking of CoreCLR on Android #114629
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-android, 10.0.0
  • add support of TLS 1.3 on macOS POC #104835
    area-System.Net.Security, os-mac-os-x
  • [LoongArch64] Add variable lifetime update for GT_STOREIND for LoongArch64 porting from upstream's #46206 #114988
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
